item.title: Interesting links - December 2025
item.description:
Well itâ€™s that time of year already! Whilst munching on a mince pie, enjoy the final Interesting Links for 2025.

Itâ€™s been a busy twelve months for me; this time last year I was signing off from my last company, which went on to be acquiredâ€”and last week I found out that my current company (Confluent) is to be acquired by IBM. Despite my reaction against any kind of cheese moving, I figure this is going to be an interesting development and a whole new experience for me :)

item.description: What with Current NOLA 2025 happening this week, and some very last minute preparations for the demo at the keynote on day 2, this monthâ€™s links roundup is pushing it right up to the wire :) The demo was pretty cool, and finally I have a good example of how this AI stuff actually fits into a workflow ;) Iâ€™ll write it up as a blog post (or two, probably)â€”stay tuned!
